name: Survivor (itch) (Youmemez)
description:
Survivor is a game where you are the only survivor battling a group of pokeball like bots.

It is a first person shooter where the more levels you complete the harder it gets

-----------

Shooting

-----------

There are many guns to choose from

From pistols to rifles

----------

Defensive

----------

Once you attack bar is full you can activate a shield which will protect you

----------

DIFFICULTY

--------

The more levels you complete the harder the game gets

There are over 100 levels in this game

Game modes

---------

There is campaing mode, endless mode, and betting mode.

Betting mode

Betting mode is a new mode in this game

It works by betting a certain amount of game cash

Once you have defeated all enemies you cash which you bet on shall be doubled
